autofarm.title: AutoFarm
autofarm.desc: Fully automated coin, XP and item farming. Loop-based with auto-detect pathing. Set your target and let it run.

esp.title: ESP Suite
esp.desc: Player ESP with distance, health bars, and nametags drawn with Drawing API. Toggle with RightShift.

speedfly.title: Speed / Fly
speedfly.desc: WalkSpeed boost and Fly toggle. Press E to fly, Shift+E to disable. Configurable speed multiplier.

iy.title: Infinite Yield
iy.desc: Full admin command set. Use the prefix ; in chat. Commands: tp, bring, speed, fly, god, crash, and 200+ more.

antikick.title: Anti-Kick
antikick.desc: Hooks kick-related functions and RemoteEvents to silently suppress server-initiated kicks.

aimbot.title: Aimbot
aimbot.desc: Silent aim with FOV circle, smoothing, and target priority. Hold RightMouse to lock on. Press Z to toggle.
